content: This has made the rounds on the local news circut and I wanted to see what people thought about this nationally/globally. I am sad to say this is in my hometown. breif summary A man paid close to $1K to put up a selfstanding flagpole to diplay the American Flag. It is very respectful (I have seen the display myself.) problem is that the HOA of one of(if not the top) richest subdivisions in the county (he lives in this subdivision) says it is not allowed and has even started fining him $25 a day for the display.
